review_text: this thing is so cheap that it started falling apart while i was installing it!!  just turning the knob to turn the fan off/on and changing speeds and you just know that it is not going to last very long. the electric cord is so short that you need an extension cord. we are talking cheap cheap cheap here. the plastic bends with the wind. what a piece of junk.
summary: could very well be cheapest piece of junk ever
product_name: Lasko #2155A Electrically Reversible Window Fan, 16 Inches
